sentences.english: Can water of healthy atmosphere of wrinkled giant hyssop and Kang Taike eat together?

sentences.english: Patchouli is a lovely earthy scent that many like to wear as perfume.
sentences.chinese: 广藿香有一种很多人喜欢用作香水的可爱泥土香味。

sentences.english: The residues of the organic pesticides exceeded national standard in Pogostemon cablin and Panax notoginseng.

sentences.english: Objective To study the mechanism of agastache rugosa for its intestinal motion promoting action.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨藿香煎液促进小肠运动的可能机制。

sentences.english: Objective Improvement of determination on the Huoxiang Zhengqi liquid.

sentences.english: He says a flowering plant called agastache is also popular in gardens .
sentences.chinese: 他说藿香是有花的植物，它在花园中也是很常见的。

sentences.english: Patchouli has also been used extensively in modern perfumery.
sentences.chinese: 在现代，广藿香精油仍然被广泛用于制造香水。
